channel.title: User Profile on Sad Robot
channel.description: Recent content in User Profile on Sad Robot

item.title: Moving your precious user profile and documents to another folder on another drive in Windows 7
item.description: One of the things I learned long ago was to always have more than 1 drive or have my single drive partitioned. You keep your programs and operating system on the C drive. On your D drive goes all your data, downloads and anything that you don’t want to vanish on you suddenly. A couple of advantages of this are: This keeps the C drive quite lean if you want to make an image of it.
